feed.title: Fort Good Hope - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Fort Good Hope
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:50 p.m. MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Good Hope Airport 10:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
Temperature: -11.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
